author: Kate Rushton

comments.message: This company is involved in the development of a sanitary door handle - http://www.technoenterprises.com/Sanicle.htm
Hi Kate - we'd love to see an image of how the door handle that sanitizes itself works. Is there one you can find and upload to help communicate your idea to the community? Thanks!

description:
Hand washing is key to the treatment of ebola and often this is the thing that medical staff may forget. Therefore, my idea is to install squeezy bottles with alcohol solution above the handles of all entry and exits to hospitals to reduce the infection risk of all medical staff and visitors.

I believe that someone has invented a door handle that has a sanitary spray impregnated in it. I can find out more if you like.

This could be expanded to other locations.
summary: Place alcohol solution for 'hand-washing' on the doors at the entrance and exit to hospitals to reduce the spread of infection.
title: Sanitary Lotions on Doors
